feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Sun, 20 Aug 2023 14:01:10
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Zelenskyy begins talks with Sweden about receiving Gripen jets, which some experts think could give Ukraine a better chance at taking on Russia's air defenses.
- Large Language Models: Compilers for the 4th Gen of Programming Languages? [pdf]
- Grindr has a reputation for its hookup culture, but the company says a quarter of its users are there to network. The CEO says he even hired people through the app.
- AMD's 7900 XTX achieves better value for Stable Diffusion than Nvidia RTX 4080
- Part 2 - Building a Full Stack Contact Form: Node.js Backend 2023
- Part 1 - Full Stack Contact Form: Getting Started & React Frontend 2023
- Self-driving car company Cruise agreed to reduce its driverless fleet by 50% after a spate of recent crashes. San Francisco officials previously pushed for a slower rollout of robotaxis.
- Mousetrap.jl: a GUI library for Julia and C++ that fully wrap GTK4
- Unlocking the Power of Context with Google AI: A Showdown Between prefixLM and causalLM in In-Context Learning
- Oil companies are approaching influencers and enlisting PR firms to reach younger generations on social media
- Apple devices spoofed, Musk eggs on Zuckerberg and Better.com goes public

Insights:
- Zelenskyy's talks with Sweden regarding Gripen jets highlight Ukraine's efforts to strengthen its air defenses against Russia. This move could potentially shift the power dynamics in the region.
- The development of large language models as compilers for the 4th generation of programming languages presents new possibilities for software development and automation.
- Grindr's revelation that a quarter of its users are there to network showcases the evolving nature of social networking platforms and their potential for professional connections.
- The comparison between AMD's 7900 XTX and Nvidia RTX 4080 highlights the competition in the graphics card market and the pursuit of better performance and value.
- The reduction of Cruise's driverless fleet after recent crashes raises concerns about the safety and regulation of autonomous vehicles.
- Mousetrap.jl's GUI library for Julia and C++ demonstrates the continuous development of tools and frameworks to enhance programming capabilities.
- Google AI's exploration of in-context learning and the comparison between prefixLM and causalLM showcases the advancements in natural language processing and contextual understanding.
- The collaboration between oil companies, influencers, and PR firms reflects the industry's adaptation to reach younger audiences through social media marketing.
- The spoofing of Apple devices, Musk's interaction with Zuckerberg, and Better.com's public listing highlight notable events in the tech industry.

Business:
- Zelenskyy says Ukraine is working with Sweden to produce 'cool vehicles' like CV90s: 'Just what is needed at the front'
- Grindr has a reputation for its hookup culture, but the company says a quarter of its users are there to network. The CEO says he even hired people through the app.
- Self-driving car company Cruise agreed to reduce its driverless fleet by 50% after a spate of recent crashes. San Francisco officials previously pushed for a slower rollout of robotaxis.
- Cellebrite asks cops to keep its phone hacking tech ‘hush hush’
- Oil companies are approaching influencers and enlisting PR firms to reach younger generations on social media
- Apple devices spoofed, Musk eggs on Zuckerberg and Better.com goes public

Insights:
- Zelenskyy's statement about Ukraine working with Sweden to produce vehicles like CV90s highlights the country's efforts to enhance its military capabilities and strengthen its defense industry.
- Grindr's recognition of its users' networking intentions showcases the platform's potential for professional connections and expands its scope beyond its hookup reputation.
- Cruise's decision to reduce its driverless fleet after recent crashes raises concerns about the safety and public acceptance of autonomous vehicles.
- Cellebrite's request for confidentiality regarding its phone hacking technology suggests the sensitive nature of its services and the potential implications for law enforcement practices.
- The collaboration between oil companies, influencers, and PR firms reflects the industry's adaptation to reach younger audiences through social media marketing.
- The spoofing of Apple devices, Musk's interaction with Zuckerberg, and Better.com's public listing highlight notable events in the business and technology sectors.

AI:
- Large Language Models: Compilers for the 4th Gen of Programming Languages? [pdf]
- Unlocking the Power of Context with Google AI: A Showdown Between prefixLM and causalLM in In-Context Learning

Insights:
- The exploration of large language models as compilers for the 4th generation of programming languages presents new possibilities for AI-driven software development and automation.
- Google AI's research on in-context learning and the comparison between prefixLM and causalLM highlight the advancements in natural language processing and contextual understanding, contributing to the development of more sophisticated AI systems.

Other:
- A national security historian explains why you won’t probably find aliens at Area 51
- W. H. Auden’s 1954 review of The Fellowship of the Ring
- Sleep ALL NIGHT to Heavy Rain | Black screen, 10 hrs, No ads
- Today’s Wordle #792 Hints, Clues And Answer For Sunday, August 20th
- The Rimac Nevera Has Broken the Production EV Nurburgring Lap Record
- A new way to identify chiral molecules with light could vastly improve detection
- How to watch UFC 292: live streams for Sterling vs. O'Malley, Weili vs. Lemos title fights
- Stormzy at All Points East review: after a slow start the rapper gave fans a fast and furious thrill ride - Yahoo Canada Sports
- Little Rock Nine members slam restrictions on AP African American Studies course in Arkansas
- North Korea's new ICBM looks and works an awful lot like a Russian ICBM, experts say
- How to watch Messi and Inter Miami vs. Nashville live stream in Leagues Cup final
- A judge dismissed a Wisconsin politician's defamation suit against a newspaper, but the legal fees may still shutter the paper.
- Stormzy at All Points East review: after a slow start the rapper gave fans a fast and furious thrill ride - Yahoo Eurosport UK

Insights:
- The explanation by a national security historian regarding the unlikelihood of finding aliens at Area 51 provides insights into the popular culture and speculation surrounding the secretive military facility.
- W. H. Auden's review of The Fellowship of the Ring in 1954 offers a historical perspective on the reception and impact of J.R.R. Tolkien's work.
- The mention of the Rimac Nevera breaking the production EV Nurburgring lap record highlights advancements in electric vehicle technology and performance.
- The development of a new method to identify chiral molecules with light showcases potential advancements in detection techniques with various applications.
- The coverage of UFC 292 and the review of Stormzy's performance at All Points East offer insights into the entertainment and sports industries.
- The criticism by Little Rock Nine members regarding restrictions on an AP African American Studies course sheds light on ongoing debates about curriculum and education.
- The comparison between North Korea's new ICBM and a Russian ICBM raises questions about international relations and potential collaborations or influences.
- The coverage of a defamation suit against a newspaper and its potential impact on the publication highlights the challenges faced by media organizations in the face of legal battles.
